name: The Cartoonists that Fought World War II
The Violent World of Red Barry
The Art Deco World of George McManus
The Case of the Missing Cartoonist
The GOlden Age of Comics Promotion
Little Orphan Annie and the Man that Lived a Billion Years
The Cartoon Art of Norman ROckwell

person_credits.name: Winsor McCay
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

person_credits.name: Charles M. Schulz
person_credits.role: penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover, other

volume.name: Nemo: The Classic Comics Library Annual

description: A freaky read from the producer of the film Menace II Society! An ordinary traveling salesman on an uneventful trip through the Midwest...until, that is, he picks up a seriously ill hitch hiker. That's when the pounding Headaches start...and bizarre hallucinations...and the creeping paranoia...missing time...and all those mutilated bodies! A dedicated family man, all Hurdis Jones wants to do is make it home to his worried wife and kids. But his journey becomes impossibly long and fraught with horror. From screenwriter John Cork (The Long Walk Home and Bond Girls Forever)! In this first full co-venture between Moonstone and film publisher Cinemagraphix!
name: GN

description: Comics and film collide in the first co-venture between Moonstone and film publisher CinemaGrafix; a bold new approach from the producer of the film, Menace II Society! Traveling salesman Hurdis Jones is an ordinary man on an uneventful trip through the midwest, until he gives a seriously ill hitchhiker a ride to the hospital. That's when he starts getting pounding headaches... and bizarre hallucinations... and the feeling like he's being followed... and having blackouts... and stumbling upon all those mutilated bodies... A dedicated family man, all Hurdis wants to do is To make it home, but his journey becomes impossibly long and fraught with horror. Ships with two covers in a 50/50 ratio. Written by screenwriter John Cork (The Long Walk Home), give this full-color teaser issue a try for just .99Â¢ this July, then be sure to check out the graphic novel coming in September!

Once upon a time in swinging London, around 1966, there was a serial killer who loved Elvis, a fab foursome that worshipped Satan, trendy vampires looking for kicks, an ancient and hungry evil, young and hungry love and...there was revolution in the air. Get your trip together, baby. Tune in, turn on and FANG out!
name: GN

description: When industrious, right-wing survivalist David Paxton is sent to a tough Texas prison, he has no idea that it's secretly run by vampires, who use the inmates to feed on. Now, Paxton's one hope of escape is a desperate prison riot and an uneasy alliance with a ruthless killer named Robbart.

deck: Graphic novel based on stories by Thomas Ligotti
description:
This paperback edition contains four short stories based on the writings of Horror Master Thomas Ligotti who also does all the introductions which lead in the separate stories.

Stories where clowns take part in a sinister winter festival, a scheming girlfriend makes reality itself come unraveled, a crumbling asylum's destruction unleashes a greater horror, and a mysterious Teatro comes and goes, leaving only shattered dreams in its wake.

The stories are:

  • The Last Feast of Harlequin
  • Dream of Mannikin
  • Dr. Locrain's Asylum
  • Teatro Grottesco
name: Volume 1

description: Horror master Thomas Ligotti's stories are adapted by comics' most talented writers and illustrators in this second volume of The Nightmare Factory. In "Sect of the Idiot" and "The Chymist," writer Stuart Moore explores the Lovecraftian landscape of a world where all is not quite as it seems, and chronicles the life of a doctor whose oath is to harm rather than to heal. Writer Joe Harris ushers forth a sinister backwoods carnival Showman and an evil, ethereal puppet who haunt their victims' every waking dream and sleeping nightmare in "Gas Station Carnivals" and "The Clown Puppet." Fans of the horror gere and of the first volume of The Nightmare Factory won't want to miss this latest take on the legendary author's most celebrated works.
name: Volume 2

description: The family curse turned Davey Doyle into a werewolf. Powerless to stop himself, he slaughtered his family. Davey has chosen his penance: to use the power of his curse for good...as Nightwolf. As he struggles to balance the demon and the hero within, Davey learns it's not as simple as good vs. evil. An exciting, dark new super-hero from Visible Light Entertainment!

The family curse turned Davey Doyle into a werewolf. He killed his family. Now Davey pays his penance as Quad City's very own dark avenger: Nightwolf. He imprints the scent of evil men to avoid hunting innocents when he turns...but things don't always go as planned.

For the accursed Nightwolf, unlikely werewolf turned hero Davey Doyle, complications arise as attention turns from the Quad City streets to his fraying relationship with Shannon. Also, King Minus pursues elusive evidence of Davey's Cop-killing transformation accident, stepping closer and closer to the secret of who or what Nightwolf really is!

Read the book that Batman's Scott Snyder calls "a really cool, progressive story about young outcast crusaders." A hard-edged vigilante series about two young heroes who avenge the torture of animals.
Everyone wants a piece of Logan... and they'll stop at nothing to get it. In Hollywood, no one can hear you scream. Part three of three
name: The Protector Chapter Three

description: THE PHOENIX: Part One - While the world is still reeling from the events of Unleashed, Sela and the newly resurrected Belinda have made it their mission to help people in need. This leads them to Kiera, a beautiful Highborn with a fiery secret who has been living among humans for centuries. As Sela learns the story of the mythological Phoenix's rebirth, the truth about the plan the Dark One has been putting into motion for years comes to light.
name: The Phoenix Part 1

description:
WIth EXCLUSIVE DIGITAL CONTENT including original art and sketches! Exploding out of the revived, award-winning anthology created by Dave Elliott comes this riot of colorful violence! Carpe DIEm are the world's seven greatest, color-coded assassins (one for each day of the week, though everybody hates Mondays) who are sent to whack the planet's deadliest villains when every other line of defense has fallen in the line of duty. This issue, the group tangle with AARON ' THE IRON' CHEF, a maniacal mastery of cybernetic cutlery and diabolic cuisine!

Quam Minimum Credula Postero - Carpe Diem

Note: This is for the digital edition (6/19/2013), the printed version was released on (6/12/2013) in the volume A1 and includes A1: The Weirding Willows #1 (06/05/2013) & A1: Odyssey #1 (6/26/2013) digital editions.
name: ...Seize The Day!!

volume.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Die Saga Vom Dunkelelf Megaband

description: Translates Aquaman #7-13.
name: Die Andere Liga

description:
For the first time in one trade paperback, it's the year one tales of both Robin and Batgirl, from BATGIRL YEAR ONE #1-9 and ROBIN YEAR ONE #1-4. See what happens when Robin dons his costume for the first time, then learn how Barbara Gordon transformed from ordinary citizen to costumed super heroine.

In this over sized book, some of the finest makers of comics spin tales about two of Batmans most iconic sidekicks first years as superheroes.

In Batgirl, Barbara Gordon learns how to be a superheroine, while also battling against Killermoth and Firefly!

In Robin, Dick Grayson recuperates from the deaths of his parents, and with Batman, has to face Two-face and Mad hatter!
name: TPB

volume.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV-Comic
Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV-Comic

description: Translates Peter Parker: Spider-Man #156.1, The Amazing Spider-Man #628, 692, The Sensational Spider-Man #33.1-33.2 and Web of Spider-Man #129.1-129.2.

The Magistrate begins to question if Amelia's right for the Protector job after all! Meanwhile, at the Dunes of Forgiveness, the Omega Company fight some particularly nasty monsters who are up to... well, they'll have to figure that out, and soon, if they want to survive! Also: who was the first Lemmy... ? Adam, D.J., Nick, Rachel, and Ruiz are at it again with AMELIA COLE AND THE HIDDEN WAR issue 2!

volume.name: Amelia Cole and the Hidden War

description: Workaholic Betty has been so busy with her new role as assistant principle that she barely has time for anything else-- least of all Archie! Will she be too busy for the surprise Archie is planning for her? Meanwhile, the streak of Riverdale robberies comes to a head in a gripping conclusion that-- well, you'll just have to see for yourself! Don't miss it!
name: Riverdale Takedown: Over Our Heads Part 6

description: It's the day before the big election and Kevin Keller's run for senate has nearly reached its conclusion! Just when campaign manager Veronica thinks she can take a well-deserved breather, she's about to get the shock of her life! She's not the only one, as Archie, Jughead and Mr. Lodge's worlds are quickly turning upside down and thereÃ­s just one man responsible for everyone's misery!
name: Election Day and Other Disasters: Politics As Usual Part 6

description: Before Edison Rex dedicated himself to defending the Earth, he was best known as a villain. But what kind of man was Edison before he became the arch-nemesis of the world's greatest hero?

HOLY COW COMICS #2 features the world's greatest crimefighter, Mighty Man of Justice, in a series of short adventures able to be easily read by younger and beginning readers and enjoyed by fans of all ages. Also on tap is The Work-A-Day World Of Mr. Awesome, where we explore the trials and tribulations of maintaining a secret identity and ask the question "why DOES the world's greatest hero need a day job"..?
name: Mighty Man of Justice

person_credits.name: George Broderick, Jr.
person_credits.role: writer, editor, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: "Archie Marries Veronica" It's the day before the big election and Kevin Keller's run for senate has nearly reached its conclusion! Just when campaign manager Veronica thinks she can take a well-deserved breather, she's about to get the shock of her life! She's not the only one, as Archie, Jughead and Mr. Lodge's worlds are quickly turning upside down and thereÃ­s just one man responsible for everyone's misery! "Archie Marries Betty" Workaholic Betty has been so busy with her new role as assistant principle that she barely has time for anything else-- least of all Archie! Will she be too busy for the surprise Archie is planning for her? Meanwhile, the streak of Riverdale robberies comes to a head in a gripping conclusion that-- well, you'll just have to see for yourself! Don't miss it!
name: Election Day and Other Disasters; Riverdale Takedown

description: Enter the world of Sam Henderson's Magic Whistle and it's insane cast of characters. Collected for the first time here are the funniest comics from a decade of insanity. Learn new uses for your robot duck.
Jack Maguire has many secrets to hide. Detective Rose Yancey, Jack's partner continues to be left in the dark, in more ways than one.
name: Volume 1.2: You Don't Know Jack

description:
Join us one last time as the critically acclaimed anthology Outlaw Territory returns with its largest volume ever! Thirty-five tales of the Old West from some of the biggest and brightest talent in the industry today. A wonderful addition to any comic lover or Western enthusiast's bookshelf. Overlooking such an extraordinary collection of graphic storytelling would be downright criminal!

Note: The digital edition (6/19/2013) was released one week before the print edition (6/26/2013).
name: Vol. 3

description: Tank Girl is back and taking a dive! Miniaturised and squirted straight into Booga's testicles to rescue him from a radiowave-induced coma, TG and the gang are forced to confront the deep danger and depravity hidden inside Booga's brain! Time is against them, and danger dogs their every splash! Can they prevail?
name: Part 2; Three Ladies, A Kangaroo, & A LIttle Baby; The Girl That Cleansed Our Souls

description: Inspired by the works of Harvey Pekar -- with whom he has been compared --Jonathan Baylis's So Buttons #2 features six autobiographical stories, wry observations on marriage, Vietnam, Republicans, Forrest J. Ackerman and John Lennon. The book's opener, "So... She Married Me Anyway," relates the moments leading up to the author's intended elopement, and is a perfect example of Baylis's prowess as a storyteller, deftly handling the layers of emotions that accompany such an auspicious event with his signature economy and restraint. In the collection's tour de force "So... I'm Standing on the Deck of the USS Intrepid," Baylis revisits the historic battleship with his uncle, who served on the ship during Vietnam. Four additional tales round out the collection. With a cover by T.J. Kirsch (Uncle Slam Fights Back by Oni Press), So Buttons #2 features color and black-and-white interior art by Kirsch, David Beyer Jr. (Tales of the Starlight Drive-In by Image Comics), and award-winning illustrator Tim Ogline.

Superduck's powers are put to the test when a time-travelling burglar steals priceless artifacts...from other thieves! Always a step ahead, catching this timeless crook seems impossible. That is, until he runs into a couple of renegade cops on the same mission. But time is running out...
name: Kronin

description: 12 CHAPTER DIGITAL EXCLUSIVE SERIES! RAMPAGE! A maddened GRIMLOCK can't tell friend from foe as the curse of the DINOBOTS reveals itself in full force. And the DECEPTICON aren't going to stand idly by--SCORPONOK unveils his ultimate plan!
name: Chapter 9: Unleashed

description: The Sinister 7 are closer than ever to assembling the Ultramachine! The Ultraheroes seem to have a traitor among them! But, who is it? Meanwhile, at Villa Rosa, the seventh and last ultrapod is in great danger! What will happen next? And who will ultimately win this battle between good and evil?
name: Good and Evil

description: The search for the Ultramachines is almost over, and the battle between the Ultraheroes and the Sinister 7 is heating up. But when Eega Beeva gets zapped by a maddening growth ray and attacks Duckburg, all bets are off, and battle lines are redrawn! With a giant Eega Beeva rampaging through town, only one question remains. Can old enemies join forces to stop a threat that could destroy the world?
name: Past and Future

description: Fables: Werewolves of the Heartland
name: Werewolves of the Heartland

character_credits.name: Doctor Sieglinde von Abensberg und Traun

first_appearance_characters.name: Doctor Sieglinde von Abensberg und Traun

description: Translates Before Watchmen: Rorschach #1-4.
Translates Before Watchmen: Minutenmen #1-6.
Translates Injustice: Gods Among Us Year 1 #1-3.
name: Band 1

volume.name: Game of Thrones: Das Lied von Eis und Feuer

description: A fisherman's wife tends the garden and animals while her husband is at sea, but secrets buried under the waves begin to bubble to the surface revealing a secret treachery and forgotten truth. The third and final book in a trilogy of critically acclaimed stand-alone stories by award winning creator Becky Cloonan.
name: Demeter

person_credits.name: Becky Cloonan
person_credits.role: writer, editor, artist, letterer, cover, production

description: During a formal visit to the Amazons of Jade, Gina gets a special surprise from her "cousin" L'retta: introduction to a group of Athle (primitive, male Amazons)! As Gina's hormones battle with her reason, the Athle, who are very rare and zealously protected, escape through a portal to Earth. Gina has to control both the little lost bishies and herself before their magical abilities cause too much trouble!

The final chapter continues! In the ruins of Chicago, the hunted becomes the hunter as Planters struggles to stay alive and free his teammates from their captors. Meanwhile, Ian's battle with the zombie virus takes an unexpected turn-one that will put the rest of the team and their entire mission at risk.
